title: LockerToken
author: LockerToken
content: The LOCKER (Room) is a digital ecosystem designed for professional sports teams, players and fans to connect in the new digital world. We offer Blockchain specific application development, consulting and integration assistance, helping our clients position themselves at the forefront of upcoming digital trends. We offer a full suite of Blockchain and Web3 focused products and services to be integrated in the existing business operations of professional sports teams. The primary service offers whitelabel apps like team themed wallets and NFT marketplaces, allowing teams to easily adopt and utilize a variety of crypto apps without the need to employ internal development staff, awhile providing their fans with a team personalized App experience.  Team WalletWe offer Teams and Players secure non-custodial cryptocurrency wallets to store major coins & tokens like Bitcoin, Ethereum and many others. The LOCKER Wallet is built for the sports industry and boasts industry leading features making it easy to navigate Web3. Besides storing, sending and trading cryptocurrencies, the wallet contains a social media section for player/fan engagement and access to all Web3 Decentralized Applications.Fiat On RampFor retail users like fans, we make it easy to purchase major cryptocurrencies like BTC & ETH, via credit or bank card. For professional Teams, we work with OTC (Over The Counter) desks to buy & sell cryptocurrencies in large quantities at optimal market prices. Typically purchasing coins like BTC directly from miners, selling it to our clients.  Crypto PayrollRepresenting +350 international players in countries across Europe, we offer a crypto based payroll system where Teams can easily pay players, and Players can access their funds anywhere in the world, without the need for temporarily opening local bank accounts. www.locker-token.comDownload App:https://apps.apple.com/us/app/locker-token/id1619140841https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.lockertoken
